Context: [[X]] sat by the window, watching the world go by outside.

Context: [[X]] sat in a quiet corner of the room, the soft glow of a lamp illuminating the space.

Context: [[X]] stood at the edge of the crowded dance floor, watching as people swirled and laughed under the colorful lights.

Context: [[X]] stood in the conference room, surrounded by colleagues and a whiteboard covered in notes.
